Hi Robert,

Thanks for the reply.

Actually the code is not written by me. We get this
code as part of web application and hence I couldnt
change this.

I am new to XPath expressions. It would be great if I
could any sample code that suits my scenario.

Thanks in advance,
Saldin

--- Robert <yahoo@...> wrote:

> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, saldin samuel
> <saldin_s@y...> wrote:
> > It would be great if anyone can tell me how to
> capture
> > the image as HtmlImage for the above script which
> does
> > not have Id or Name attribute.
> 
> An XPath expression would probably do it. Me - I'd
> give the image an
> ID if I wanted to test it that badly.
> 
> 
>
